title: PBE to Live Server
body: So my friend and I are waiting for a skin to come out but its currently on the PBE, How long does it take or what is the average time it takes for something on the PBE to get transferd to the Live Servers

replies.body: Generally, it will release on the patch following it's addition to the PBE, unless unforeseen complications arrive or if it's event related (event related items might go onto the PBE 2-3 patches prior to their live release). It's likely the skin you are waiting on will come out with the next patch, which is likely to be in 2 weeks time (19th/20th April).

What if the skin was in the patch notes and did not come out?
Just asking because I am waiting for one of the skins

Riot doesn't release specific dates for when new champs/skins will be available for purchase and skins don't usually come out the day of the patch. Usually they start rolling out after a few days of the patch being rolled out, sometimes it can be towards then end of the patch cycle you end up waiting.

This.

It will always say something like "[skin] will be released during [patch number]" or "[skin] will be released later during the patch" with no specific indication of when during the patch the skin will actually be made available. As Yaia said, it is usually a few days after the start of the patch (over the first weekend of the patch).

If we look at God Fist Lee Sin, it states "God Fist Lee Sin will be released in patch 7.7!" however doesn't specify *when* during the patch it will occur. As for Dreadnova Darius, that's a Hextech Crafting exclusive so it may already be available if you have enough Gemstones.
18th/19th OCE is supposed to get patches on tuesday/wednesdays
Assuming they're not delayed by a day. If I remember correctly 7.6 was on a Thursday for OCE.

"Patch 7.6 21st March" 

Oce server had their patch dates boosted a day ahead of other servers as we are guinea pigs in case something goes wrong, so the other servers dont get retk by it, while we do, because rito hates us.

I could have sworn there was a recent patch that occurred on a Thursday.

Regardless, I'm confident that we do occasionally receive patches on a Thursday when they get delayed by a day or two.
The last Thursday patch was late 2015 early 2016...
Ok thank you for the quick reply
